query.value: select sum(amount_due) "currentOutstanding" from inv_summary where over_due_status ='N'
select Age_Bucket, sum(inv_value) inv_value from inv_summary group by Age_Bucket order by 2 desc
select COALESCE((sum(case when over_due_status ='Y' then inv_value else 0 end) *100)/sum(inv_value),0) inv_value from inv_summary where inv_status ='OPEN';

select cust_short_name customerName, sum(Amount_Due) totalOutstanding, sum(case when over_due_status ='N' then inv_value else 0 end) currentOutstanding, sum(case when over_due_status ='Y' then inv_value else 0 end) overdue, sum(case when Age_Bucket ='1-30' then inv_value else 0 end) "1-30", sum(case when Age_Bucket ='31-60' then inv_value else 0 end) "31-60", sum(case when Age_Bucket ='61-90' then inv_value else 0 end) "61-90", sum(case when Age_Bucket ='91-120' then inv_value else 0 end) "91-120", --sum(case when Age_Bucket ='121-150' then inv_value else 0 end) "121-150", sum(case when Age_Bucket ='>120' then inv_value else 0 end) ">120" from inv_summary group by cust_short_name
select (sum(case when over_due_status ='Y' then Amount_Due else 0 end) *100)/sum(Amount_Due) overDuePercent from inv_summary
select sum(ar_days)/count(distinct invoice_number) avgArDays from Closed_inv_summary
select count(case when ontime_flag ='Y' then invoice_number end)*100/count(distinct invoice_number) ontimePercent from Closed_inv_summary
select overdue_bucket , count(distinct case when over_due_status ='Y' then invoice_number end) Overdue_Invoices from inv_summary group by overdue_bucket order by 2 desc limit 5

select overdue_bucket , CASE WHEN sum(distinct case when over_due_status ='Y' then amount_due end) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sum(distinct case when over_due_status ='Y' then amount_due end) END Overdue_Invoices from inv_summary group by overdue_bucket order BY NULLIF(regexp_replace(overdue_bucket, '\D', '', 'g'), '') asc NULLS FIRST
Select age_bucket, sum(Amount_due) from inv_summary group by age_bucket

select cust_short_name customerName , count(distinct invoice_number) OpenInvoices, count(case when over_due_status ='Y' then invoice_number end) overdueInvoices, sum(case when over_due_status ='Y' then Amount_Due else 0 end) amountOverdue from inv_summary group by cust_short_name
